channel.title: [eof] admin program.... (hacker)
channel.description: yesterday, when I had my server on, a guy named [eof] had a program so he made himself admin, and fucked up my admin list.... HOW???

item.title: [eof] admin program.... (hacker)
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

I doubt it’s clientside. What you can actually do depends on serverside variables.

Read full topic

item.title: [eof] admin program.... (hacker)
item.dc:creator: @Whitey_b Whitey b
item.description:
@Whitey_b wrote:

[quote=“Faiter 1, post:6, topic:186120”][quote author=Paintball199 link=topic=248562.msg2086402#msg2086402 date=1204590074]
There are also wannabe hackers. do you have ‘mod’ command? make it ADMIN ONLY.
else people make them self admin rofl.
[/quote]

LOL -.- I made it auto-ban if u do ::mod or ::admin commands like that -.-

lol maybe you should make your server just alittle more secure and not depend on client side variables LOL…

Well, How can I get rid of em?[[/quote]
Lololololo.

Read full topic
